content: Great read but I have some thoughts - Awesome article, I really enjoyed itCould you please give just a little bit more definition and context to your trends? Just a few sentences of how you define things like diagonals, how the lines usually go up from left to right, how that relates that relates to composition, and what exactly you mean by “less-obvious?”Can you please work on getting the links straight? Sometimes the links take you to the site, other times it takes me just to the photo. Really enjoyed it though!
